data.title: How To Choose The Best Tablet For You?
meta_keywords: what to look for in a tablet
data.meta_description: There’s a lot to choose from when it comes to deciding what is the perfect tablet for you. Find out the tablet features to look out for and how to pick the best tablet to buy.
data.text:
How to choose a tablet that’s right for you?

In between a laptop and a smartphone, tablets are the perfect portable computer that lets you do more on the go without hulking a heavy laptop around. Whether you want a tablet for everyday use, completing work tasks, playing games or unleashing your creative impulses, there’s a Samsung tablet for you. But how do you pick which one?

There’s a lot to choose from when it comes to deciding which tablet model to buy. In this guide, we’ve outlined what features to look for in the newest Samsung tablet.

How do I decide what tablet to buy?

Choosing the right tablet for you depends very much on what you’re going to use it for. Key things to consider when deciding which tablet to buy are screen size, storage space, battery life and connectivity, as these factors will be affected by what you want to use it for. We have listed all the key components and features to look for when comparing different tablet models to help you decide the best tablet for you.

What is the best tablet for everyday use?

When it comes to choosing a tablet for simple, everyday tasks the Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 is the best tablet for you. This affordable tablet has a medium sized 10.5 inch, wide display which is perfect for browsing social media, checking emails and watching videos. The Octa-Core processor with up to 4GB RAM and 128GB memory gives you plenty of storage and power for all your needs, plus you can add up to 1TB of additional storage with a Micro SD card*. The long-lasting 7,040mAh battery is also more than enough to get you through the day, especially with 15W Fast Charging that will let you power up very quickly.

*MicroSD card sold separately

What is the best tablet for movie watching?

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S9+ is a perfect tablet if you’re looking for a tablet to enjoy your favourite films or series. Whether you’re catching up on a show on route to the office, or in bed with a cup of coffee, you’ll want a tablet that feels like a QLED TV in your backpack. A large tablet screen is obviously an essential feature for watching TV shows and films, so opt for a model with a display that’s above 11 inches. The Samsung Galaxy Tab S9+ has an impressive 12.4 inch screen, while the Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra’s extra large 14.6 inch screen offers a truly immersive, cinematic viewing experience - perfect for watching content on the go. Their Dynamic AMOLED 2X displays will also bring each action scene to life with vibrant colours and the deepest blacks.

*MicroSD card sold separately

What is the best tablet for drawing?

Samsung tablets are made with creatives in mind. The Galaxy Tab S9+ and Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra’s large screens allow you to see your digital art in perfect detail. All Galaxy Tab S9 tablets come with Clip Studio Paint pre-installed, so you can start creating sketches and graphic masterpieces from the get go. You can even use your Samsung smartphone* as the artist palette while using your entire Tab S9 screen as your canvas. Plus, with the S Pen included as standard, you’ll have more versatility to write, draw and paint with a stylus that follows every precise move.

*Selected Galaxy smartphones only.

What is the best tablet for gaming?

Similar to the best tablets for artists, when it comes to choosing the best tablet for gaming there are essential features to look out for. For one, a large screen will let you enjoy your games to their fullest. The Galaxy Tab S9+ and Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra’s immersive 12.4 and 14.6 inch screens will bring you right into the action. Their Dynamic AMOLED 2X displays also render each detail in crystal clear clarity with rich and vibrant colours.

When it comes to gaming tablets you’ll also need to look out for models that have the processing power to keep up with fast-action games. The Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 tablets all have the Qualcomm®Snapdragon® 8 Gen 2 processor; our fastest ever in a Samsung tablet. While their ultra-smooth 120Hz refresh rate allows them to keep up with each player’s rapid movements easily for seamless gameplay, giving you a competitive edge over your opponents. Even better with up to 256GB storage in the Galaxy Tab S9, 512GB in the Tab S9+ and up to a whopping 1TB storage in the Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra, you’ll have more than enough space to store your favourite games.

What’s the best tablet for productivity?

When looking for a tablet for work or to boost your productivity, you’ll want a model that makes tasks easier. A large screen will help you view all the details so you never miss a thing. The stunning Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra with its large display is perfect for working on key documents or attending virtual meetings. Plus, with Multi Window it’s easy to multitask effortlessly by running up to three apps on screen at once. All the Galaxy Tab S9 tablets come with the S Pen as standard, so you can even make notes using our iconic stylus on Samsung Notes while attending a video call.

If you work on the go, staying connected is important. With 5G connectivity, the Galaxy Tab S9 tablets let you enjoy a hyperfast connection which is 100 times faster than 4G. Plus, with Google Duo video calling, an Ultra Wide camera that adapts to who’s on the call and 3 microphone technology, each video call will feel life-like with pitch-perfect clarity. You can take your productivity to the next level by pairing your tablet with a tablet keyboard to take notes while on a call.

If you are still unsure which tablet is right for you, visit our ‘what is the best tablet for work guide’ for more information.
